[i]The day-night cycle of the plane had not been disrupted, so the great jungles and woodlands survived as they dispersed. Borne upon wild winds, seeds scattered to far lands to mix with other trees, creating wondrous new hybrids.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Discard any number of cards. When you do, an opponent chooses one, then chooses one for each card you discarded. The same mode can be chosen more than once.
• You draw a card, then surveil 1.
• Each of your opponents loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
• Each of your opponents discards a card at random.

Cards can't be conjured.
Tokens can't be created.
Spells can't be copied by other spells or abilities.
Sacrifice this: Detain target creature. Activate only as a sorcery. [i](Until your next turn, that creature can't attack or block and its activated abilities can't be activated.)[/i]

As an additional cost to cast this spell, torment yourself. [i](To torment yourself, lose 3 life unless you discard a card or sacrifice a nonland permanent.)[/i] 
Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from among them. That player discards that card.
